swag-customer-classification.alertPageIntroduction: Create classifications of customers based on their order data and add these to the customers as tags.
swag-customer-classification.tagWarning: Keep in mind that the specific conditions for each tag may vary depending on your business and industry, so it's important to adjust the conditions accordingly to ensure accurate classification.
swag-customer-classification.helpTextGenerateContent: Add more information such as the purposes of the classifications, the marketing campaign, the evaluation or let the AI choose it itself.
swag-customer-classification.placeholderAdditionalInfo: Group customer lifetime value in the last 3 months

notificationModal.messageBeforeTabLeave: The classification is being processed. If you close the tab, not all changes may be applied.

confirm.title: Classification - Confirm?
confirm.description: Start classifying {totalCustomer} customer? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.warning:
We will utilize the following data for customer classification: customer number, order count, last order date, total order amount, last login, and first login.

Once the customer classification process starts, old AI generated labels tags will be removed and overwritten by newly generated labels.

process.title: Classification - In process
process.description: Your customer list is being classified. Please wait!
